Package com.pornscript.process

Class Validator

java.lang.Object
com.pornscript.process.Validator
public class Validator extends Object
The validator is mainly responsible for validating the code and checking for invalid keywords

  • Field Details

    • keywords

      private HashMap<String,Command> keywords

  • Method Details

    • iterateThroughScanner

      void iterateThroughScanner(Scanner sc) throws IllegalSyntaxException, UnavailableAddressException, TooManyArgumentsException, TooFewArgumentsException
      iterate through the pornscript file, line by line. and call the runCommand() method for each line.
      Parameters:
      sc -
      Throws:
      IllegalSyntaxException
      UnavailableAddressException
      TooManyArgumentsException
      TooFewArgumentsException

    • runCommand

      private void runCommand(String[] args) throws IllegalSyntaxException, UnavailableAddressException, TooManyArgumentsException, TooFewArgumentsException
      This method will be called once per line. it checks certian conditions
      1. is it an empty line? ignore
      2. is it a comment? ignore
      3. is it a valid keyword? run
      if it's neither an empty line nor a comment nor a valid keyword. throw an illegal syntax exception
      Throws:
      IllegalSyntaxException
      UnavailableAddressException
      TooManyArgumentsException
      TooFewArgumentsException
